    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AreaClearBrick
    Represents a special brick clears a defined area around its center point when the row including the brick is completed It implements the PropBrick interface.
    Board
    Interface for a game board model.
    Brick
     
    BrickGenerator
    Defines the contract for generating and previewing brick shapes.
    BrickRotator
    Manages the rotation state of the currently falling brick.
    ClearRow
    Encapsulates result of row clearing on the game board.
    CongratulationsPanel
    Displays when the player successfully completes all defined levels.
    DownData
    Passes the results of a down movement from game controller to GUI controller.
    EventSource
    Defines the source triggering a game action event.
    EventType
    Defines types of actions or movements on the falling brick.
    GameController
    Handles the game logic between GuiController and Board.
    GameOverPanel
    Displays when the game ends.
    GuiController
    Handles GUI, user input, rendering of the board and bricks, game states, and score display.
    InputEventListener
    Interface for handling input event using in controller.
    Level
    Represents the current game level and provides constants for level thresholds and speeds.
    Main
    The main entry for Tetris game.
    MainMenuController
    Handling user interactions in main menu.
    MatrixOperations
    Contains static methods for handling 2D matrices.
    MoveEvent
    Immutable data class for controller.
    NextShapeInfo
    Handles the resulting shape matrix and its position index after a rotation.
    NotificationPanel
    Displays score bonuses when lines are cleared.
    Prop
    Contains methods for handling the position and type of prop brick
    PropBrick
    Interface for area clear brick.
    RandomBrickGenerator
    Implements a brick generator that produces random brick shapes.
    Score
    Represents current game score.
    SimpleBoard
    simple board implements board
    ViewData
    Encapsulates data for rendering.
